mainBranchIssues.title: XSS vulnerability
mainBranchIssues.description: Improper handling of user-generated content can lead to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
mainBranchIssues.impact: Attackers could inject malicious scripts, compromising user data and application integrity.

mainBranchIssues.title: Hardcoded Secrets vulnerability
mainBranchIssues.description: Hardcoded secrets such as API keys can lead to unauthorized access and data breaches.
mainBranchIssues.impact: If exposed, they can be exploited by malicious users, leading to significant security risks.
mainBranchIssues.remediation: Use environment variables to manage sensitive data

mainBranchIssues.title: Missing Error Handling
mainBranchIssues.description: Missing error handling in HTTP requests
mainBranchIssues.impact: Critical functions without tests can lead to undetected bugs and regressions, affecting application stability.
mainBranchIssues.recommendation: Add unit tests for the processPayment function to ensure its reliability and correctness.

mainBranchIssues.title: N+1 Query
mainBranchIssues.description: Current: Significant impact on performance due to excessive database queries, Expected: Reduced database load and faster response times
mainBranchIssues.impact: Excessive database queries significantly impacting performance.
mainBranchIssues.recommendation:
Optimize the query by fetching all posts in a single query:
const posts = await getPostsByUsers(users.map(user => user.id));

metadata.currentPerformance: Significant impact on performance due to excessive database queries
metadata.expectedPerformance: Reduced database load and faster response times

prBranchIssues.title: Hardcoded Dependency Version vulnerability
prBranchIssues.description: Using hardcoded dependency versions can lead to security vulnerabilities and compatibility issues as libraries evolve.
prBranchIssues.impact: Increases maintenance burden and exposure to vulnerabilities in outdated libraries
prBranchIssues.remediation: Use a version range to allow for minor updates and security patches

prBranchIssues.title: Deprecated Package Usage
prBranchIssues.description: Using deprecated packages can lead to issues when they are removed or no longer maintained.
prBranchIssues.impact: Impacts the stability of the application
prBranchIssues.remediation: Check for alternative packages or updated versions

prBranchIssues.title: Unused Dependencies
prBranchIssues.description: Unused dependencies increase the size of the project and may introduce security vulnerabilities.
prBranchIssues.impact: Increases project size and potential security risk
prBranchIssues.fixedCode:
// Remove the following line if not used
// "@types/body-parser": "^1.19.2",

prBranchIssues.title: Hardcoded Dependency Version
prBranchIssues.description: Using hardcoded dependency versions can lead to security vulnerabilities and compatibility issues as libraries evolve.
prBranchIssues.impact: Low test coverage can lead to undetected bugs and regressions, especially in critical areas of the application, affecting overall reliability.
prBranchIssues.recommendation: Increase test coverage by adding unit tests for critical functions and components: // Example: Add tests for key API endpoints and business logic.

prBranchIssues.type: Potential Memory Leak in Request Handling
prBranchIssues.title: Potential Memory Leak in Request Handling
prBranchIssues.description: If the server holds references to request objects without releasing them, it can lead to memory leaks.

prBranchIssues.type: Deep Nesting in Request Handling Logic
prBranchIssues.title: Deep Nesting in Request Handling Logic
prBranchIssues.description: Deeply nested code can make the logic hard to follow and maintain, increasing the risk of bugs.

prBranchIssues.type: Missing Test Cases for Error Handling
prBranchIssues.title: Missing Test Cases for Error Handling
prBranchIssues.description: Without testing error handling paths, the application may not behave as expected under failure conditions.

prBranchIssues.type: Lack of Timeout Handling in Requests
prBranchIssues.title: Lack of Timeout Handling in Requests
prBranchIssues.description: Not implementing timeout handling can cause requests to hang indefinitely.

prBranchIssues.type: Inefficient Use of Promises in File Handling
prBranchIssues.title: Inefficient Use of Promises in File Handling
prBranchIssues.description: Using promises inefficiently can lead to performance bottlenecks.

prBranchIssues.description: Uncaught exceptions can lead to application crashes and unpredictable behavior.

prBranchIssues.type: Low Test Coverage in Critical Areas
prBranchIssues.title: Low Test Coverage in Critical Areas
prBranchIssues.description: Low test coverage can lead to undetected bugs and regressions, especially in critical areas of the application.

prBranchIssues.title: Low test coverage: 67.5%
prBranchIssues.description: Increase test coverage to at least 80%

prBranchIssues.title: Scope Error
prBranchIssues.description: Error with OpenRouter API: cannot access free variable 'e_client' where it is not associated with a value in enclosing scope
prBranchIssues.impact: Potential unauthorized access or malfunction due to scope access issues
prBranchIssues.remediation: Ensure that all variables are properly scoped and accessible where needed

prBranchIssues.title: Configuration Issue vulnerability
prBranchIssues.impact: API may not function properly without a valid API key
prBranchIssues.remediation: Ensure the OPENROUTER_API_KEY environment variable is set with a valid API key

prBranchIssues.title: Configuration Issue
prBranchIssues.recommendation: Set the OPENROUTER_API_KEY environment variable with a valid API key

prBranchIssues.title: Environment Variable Missing
prBranchIssues.description: Missing OPENROUTER_API_KEY environment variable or it is not set with a valid API key
